name: Widget to search from ofru.ru
author: Milyutin Aleksandr Vyacheslavovich (Disabled by cerebral palsy)

sections.description:
Enables a Custom Search Engine for your site via a widget.

Features:

  • Works with any WordPress Theme
  • Just add a “Widget to search from ofru.ru” on your site.
  • Support the Mode: Multisite
  • Does not replace the default WordPress search. It runs along with it. Use both if you want.

This plugin is built and maintained by http://ofru.ru/widgets/?l=en

Plugin Forums

  • http://forum.ofru.ru/viewforum.php?f=55
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Click Plugins > Add New > search for widget to search from ofru.ru
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Click Appearance > Widgets > Drag the Widget to search from ofru.ru widget to a widget area.
sections.changelog:
1.2.4.3

  • Sorry, no new features this time This release only updates the Compatibility-Tag to WordPress 4.6. Unfortunately there is no way to do this anymore without a new version.

1.2.4.2

  • Sorry, no new features this time This release only updates the Compatibility-Tag to WordPress 4.5. Unfortunately there is no way to do this anymore without a new version.

1.2.4.1

  • Sorry, no new features this time This release only updates the Compatibility-Tag to WordPress 4.2. Unfortunately there is no way to do this anymore without a new version.

1.2.3

  • change the search engine site at is-all.ru

1.2.2

  • Fixed bug with translation into Russian

1.2

  • Optimized php code
  • Includes support for mode: Multisite
  • Deleted item from the widget’s settings: Domain

1.1.4

  • fix

1.1.3

  • update translations for : Russian, Ukrainian

1.1.1

  • Initial Release
